Client.hero_subtitle: I build things for the web.
Client.hero_text: I'm a developer with a passion for building accessible, pixel-perfect user interfaces that seamlessly combine thoughtful design with solid engineering.
Client.expertise_web_text: Crafting interactive and dynamic user interfaces with React, ensuring clean, maintainable, and well-organized code.
Client.expertise_ui_text: Crafting visually engaging, user-centered interfaces for seamless, accessible experiences.
Client.expertise_animation_subtitle: Adding depth through smooth transitions and animations
Client.expertise_animation_text: Bringing interfaces to life with engaging animations and transitions.
Client.expertise_responsive_text: Building layouts and components that look and perform beautifully on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
Client.expertise_api_text: Experience in integrating REST and GraphQL APIs, ensuring seamless data fetching and management.
Client.expertise_collaboration_text: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver cohesive, high-quality projects.
Client.work_freelance_text: Planned and built the front-end part completely from scratch. Implemented smooth transitions and animation of components. Maintained admin panel in Payload CMS.
Client.work_eliftech_text: Contributed to the development of the fintech app, helping users achieve financial goals through features like a sleek, intuitive Wishlist tool for budgeting and planning. Worked on a paragliding social network, building key interfaces and features such as User Profiles, Reviews, and Complaints & Suggestions, while ensuring a user-friendly experience with real-time weather updates and event tracking.
Client.work_custom4web_text: Developed, maintained, and shipped production code for client websites primarily using Vue, HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, and jQuery
Client.work_triplefork_text: Developed, maintained, and shipped production code for client websites primarily using HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, and jQuery
Client.project_art_center_text: Portal with articles, events, and new releases within the art space. Implemented smooth transitions and animation of components.
Client.project_music_award_text: The Icelandic Music Awards are a harvest festival for the Icelandic music industry, where what is done well is celebrated and respected. Built majority of screens and components.Transfered FE to the headless CMS Prismic.
Client.about_main_text:
Hi there!
You’ve probably figured out by now that I’m a Web Developer who’s passionate about crafting smooth, responsive, and visually engaging web experiences. I love blending creativity with code, making sure every pixel is in its place while keeping performance top-notch. I’ve been doing this for almost 3 years now, and it never gets old.
Client.about_honorable_mention: One of the projects I had the chance to contribute to even earned an Honorable Mention on Awwwards—which was a pretty cool moment!
